com.revature.jfbennatt.ers.daos.postgres

Class EmployeeDaoPostgres

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.jfbennatt.ers.daos.postgres.EmployeeDaoPostgres
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EmployeeDao

    public class EmployeeDaoPostgres
extends java.lang.Object
implements EmployeeDao
    Implementation of EmployeeDao used to access the Postgresql database on AWS.
    Author:
    Jared F Bennatt

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        manId - Id of manager approving request.
        reimbId - Id of reimbursement being approved.
        date - Date of approval.

        Description copied from interface: EmployeeDao
        Attempts to delete the plain text token from the database.
        Specified by:
        deleteSessionToken in interface EmployeeDao
        Parameters:
        token - Session token of the user that will be deleted (the token, not the user).
        Returns:
        Whether or not the token was actually deleted

      • getAllEmployeesExceptManager

        public java.util.List<Employee> getAllEmployeesExceptManager(int manId)
        Description copied from interface: EmployeeDao
        Returns a list of all employees excluding the manager passed as an argument.
        Specified by:
        getAllEmployeesExceptManager in interface EmployeeDao
        Parameters:
        manId - Employee of the id of the manager (to be excluded from the list).
        Returns:
        List of Employee objects (or null if there is an error). An empty list is not an error.

      • getAllPendingRequestsExceptManager

        Returns a list of all reimbursements that are pending and aren't from this manager.
        Specified by:
        getAllPendingRequestsExceptManager in interface EmployeeDao
        Parameters:
        manId - Employee id of the requesting manager
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects or null if there is an error (an empty list is not an error).

        Description copied from interface: EmployeeDao

        Specified by:
        getAllProcessedRequests in interface EmployeeDao
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects or null if there's an error (an empty list is not an error).

      • getAllReimbursementsByEmployeeId

        public java.util.List<Reimbursement> getAllReimbursementsByEmployeeId(int empId)
        Description copied from interface: EmployeeDao
        Returns all of the reimbursements for this employee. If none exist, this will return an empty list.
        Specified by:
        getAllReimbursementsByEmployeeId in interface EmployeeDao
        Parameters:
        empId - Id of employee to fetch reimbursements for.
        Returns:
        A List of Reimbursement objects (or null if there is an error). Note: having no records is not an error and, instead, an empty list will be returned.

      • getEmployeeByEmail

        public Employee getEmployeeByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Description copied from interface: EmployeeDao
        Gets an employee from their email. This is intended to be used to log in an employee and thus this method should set (at a minimum) the password, id, and first and last name of the Employee object being returned.
        Specified by:
        getEmployeeByEmail in interface EmployeeDao
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the employee.
        Returns:
        An Employee object representing the employee or null if the employee doesn't exist.

      • getEmployeeByToken

        public Employee getEmployeeByToken(java.lang.String token)
        Description copied from interface: EmployeeDao
        Finds an employee based on their session token. This method should set every field in the returned Employee object except the password.
        Specified by:
        getEmployeeByToken in interface EmployeeDao
        Parameters:
        token - Session token of the employee (theoretically the employee would have already logged in and received a session token).
        Returns:
        Employee object representing the employee or null if the session token is invalid.

      • getPendingReimbursementsByEmployeeId

        public java.util.List<Reimbursement> getPendingReimbursementsByEmployeeId(int empId)
        Description copied from interface: EmployeeDao
        Gets all of the pending requests from this employee id.
        Specified by:
        getPendingReimbursementsByEmployeeId in interface EmployeeDao
        Parameters:
        empId - Employee id of the employee to fetch requests from.
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects for this employee.

        public java.lang.String getStatus(Reimbursement reimb)

        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface EmployeeDao
        Parameters:
        reimb - Reimbursement object to find the status of.
        Returns:

      • submitRequest

        public boolean submitRequest(Reimbursement newReimb)
        Description copied from interface: EmployeeDao
        Attempts to submit (add) a reimbursement to the database.
        Specified by:
        submitRequest in interface EmployeeDao
        Parameters:
        newReimb - Reimbursement object representing this request. At a minimum, the employee id, description, amount, date of expense (reimbDate), and the submit date must be present in this object.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the submission was successfully added to the database.
